attributes.action: I want to raise awareness for mental health in school for kids.
attributes.additional_details: So I would love for mental health to be raised awareness for kids in schools, it could prevent bulking as other kids may understand it’s nit just physically you can hurt someone it’s mentslly and also I think it’s a stronger subject than sex education.
attributes.background: I really want to help kids in schools understand mental health, it can help them ready for adulthood.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We understand that you're concerned about mental health in schools, but we're not sure what you'd like to happen. 

If you would like "Mental Health Education and coping strategies to be taught in schools", you might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/204268

You could also start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You'll need to give your full name to start a petition.
